entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending this evening. Clearing late this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
